TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MySiteProfileHandler extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.Office.Server.UserProfiles.IProfileEventInterface

remarks.para: The interface is used to execute code whenever a user profile is about to be deleted. The default handler assigns the deleted user's My Site to that person's manager. If you want that behavior, you can subclass it.
For more information about the interface, see .

Docs.summary: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the specified user profile in the specified Shared Service Provider context is successfully deleted.
Docs.returns: true if the user profile is successfully deleted; otherwise, false.
